To keep in mind that if Writing on boths nodes (also on different schemas), the node taking over may not fully ready unless consistency is set to REGIONAL_RAW.
At the best what could happen is just a PK conflict:
FATAL: mysql_drv_query() returned error 1062 (Duplicate entry '18828082' for key 'PRIMARY') 





Using Proxy
